{"name": "The District of Columbia’s (District) - SNAP Application", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit" If your child is not pre-approved, you can fill out the SUN Bucks application opening on June 3rd. Sign up to get an alert when the application opens here.  https://sunbucks.us13.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=a043f6c25c1b05f20ca7e241c&id=a6b7c8adfc
The District of Columbia’s (District) Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) (formerly known as Food Stamps) helps low-income individuals and families by providing monthly benefits to purchase food. 
You can apply for SNAP by completing an application, providing documents to verify your eligibility, and participating in an interview. 
Find out if you may be eligible before applying: https://districtdirect.dc.gov/ua/eligibility/benefit-selection
Applications are accepted online at https://districtdirect.dc.gov/ua/, via mobile application https://dhs.dc.gov/page/district-direct-mobile-app, in-person https://dhs.dc.gov/service/find-service-center-near-you, fax (202-671-4400), or through the mail: Department of Human Services | Economic Security Administration
Case Record Management Unit
P.O. Box 91560
Washington, DC 20090", "email": "", "url": "https://districtdirect.dc.gov/ua/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 727-5355", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "20:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "20:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "20:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "20:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "20:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "The District of Columbia’s (District) Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) (formerly known as Food Stamps) helps low-income individuals and families by providing monthly benefits to purchase food.  You can apply for SNAP by completing an application, providing documents to verify your eligibility, and participating in an interview.  Find out if you may be eligible before applying: https://districtdirect.dc.gov/ua/eligibility/benefit-selection Applications are accepted online at https://districtdirect.dc.gov/ua/, via mobile application https://dhs.dc.gov/page/district-direct-mobile-app, in-person https://dhs.dc.gov/service/find-service-center-near-you, fax (202-671-4400), or through the mail: Department of Human Services | Economic Security Administration Case Record Management Unit P.O. Box 91560 Washington, DC 20090"}]}
